questions.title: How satisfied are you with the project's progress?
questions.description: Rate your satisfaction with the overall project progress and milestones achieved

questions.title: What aspects of the project are you most satisfied with and what areas need improvement?
questions.description: Please provide detailed feedback about what's working well and what could be enhanced

questions.title: Describe your technical growth in the project and areas where you'd like to improve
questions.description: Share your experience with technical skills development and learning opportunities

questions.title: How effective is communication within the team?
questions.description: Rate the effectiveness of team communication and information sharing

questions.title: Share your experience with team communication and suggest improvements
questions.description: Provide specific examples and recommendations for better communication

questions.title: How would you rate the leadership in your project?
questions.description: Evaluate the effectiveness of project leadership and management

questions.title: Describe your ideal work environment and what aspects of the current environment could be improved
questions.description: Share your thoughts on the work environment and suggestions for improvement

questions.title: Share your experience with work-life balance and suggest ways to improve it
questions.description: Provide feedback on work-life balance and recommendations for better balance

questions.title: Do you feel supported by your team members?
questions.description: Rate your level of support from team members

questions.title: What additional resources or support would help you perform better?
questions.description: Identify any resources or support that could enhance your performance
